programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sem Ttulo

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Simulao
programme.desc: Chega uma mensagem da Aldeia da Areia sobre o sequestro do Kazekage. Tsunade manda a equipe Kakashi para a aldeia. Kankuro comea a batalha contra os Akatsuki, mas as tticas dos bonecos no funcionam. Seu oponente foi quem desenvolveu essas tticas.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus summons Relinquished, a fearsome monster that can consume Yugi's Duel Monsters! Yugi counters with Kuriboh?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi meets a mysterious Egyptian named Shadi who enters Yugi's mind with the Millennium Key. What are these Millennium Items, and do they hold the answer to the mystery behind the Shadow Games?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends return from the Duelist Kingdom only to meet a young girl named Rebecca who demands that Grandpa return Blue-Eyes White Dragon to her.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rebecca mistakenly believes that Grandpa stole the Blue-Eyes White Dragon from her grandfather. Yugi must defend the Blue-Eyes White Dragon to teach her that it's not the power of the cards, but the heart that's in them that counts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The two-faced Board of Directors of Kaiba Corporation trap Kaiba inside a virtual reality game. Mokuba recruits Yugi and Joey to free Kaiba from this ultimate game where losing equals death!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The quest for Kaiba continues with a little help from Mai? But can YUGI and friends adapt to a virtual world where the rules and strategies keep changing every step of the way?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends rescue Kaiba, but they are still stuck in the game! The only exit is past a Five-Headed Dragon, but in the difficult duel, Joey, Mokuba, and Mailose all their life points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Duke Devlin defeats Joey and humiliates him in public, forcing Yugi to challenge Duke to a duel. However, this will not be a Duel Monsters duel, but a new game named Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In exchange for Joey's freedom, Yugi agrees to give up Duel Monsters forever if he loses. Unfamiliar with the rules, Yugi gets off to a rough start.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Duke, but Duke has one more rule to mention: All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board. With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi's position is helpless!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Duke's all-powerful Orogoth The Relentless dices Yugi's entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points!

programme.desc: An arcane fortune teller steals the Millennium Puzzle and Yugi must defeat him in a duel to win it back.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of Duel Monsters is revealed. Using the magic of the Millennium Necklace, Egyptian historian Ishizu Ishtar shows Kaiba how Duel Monsters was played millenniums ago.

programme.desc: The spirit of the Millennium Puzzle realizes that his memories of ancient Egypt have faded, but Tea helps him uncover the mysteries of his past.

programme.desc: The magic card Infinite Cards allows Strings to hold an unlimited number of cards in his hand.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the sea duelist Mako Tsunami and his bevy of underwater beasts. If Joey wins, he'll have all six Locator Cards necessary to enter the Battle City Finals, but if he loses, he can kiss the finals goodbye.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mako's oceanic warrior, The Legendary Fisherman, unleashes a wave of destruction by stealthily destroying Joey's monsters from the depths of the sea. Joey has to put his skills, training, and experience to the ultimate test before he's all washed out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik, with the help of Bakura, kidnaps Joey and Tea. The Rare Hunters also kidnap Mokuba to force Yugi and Kaiba to take on tag team duelists Umbra and Lumis on top of a skyscraper. The losers will be sent plummeting into the Shadow Realm.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 1 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: The plan is launched! Big Mom falls to pieces as the wedding - and the wedding cake - are destroyed and a slew of Luffys are wreaking havoc around the site. But just when Luffy gets in trouble, Jimbei confronts Big Mom bravely!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Returning the Sake Cup! The Manly Jimbei Pays His Debt!

programme.title: The plan is in full swing however - Big Mom is pushed past the edge of sanity and can't even bring herself to act. Meanwhile, her children make a move against Germa and Pudding takes up her original aim of killing Sanji!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Mission Failed?! The Big Mom Pirates Strike Back!

programme.title: The plot is in full swing as Luffy dashes towards Big Mom to show her the broken portrait again! Sanji makes an effort to free his family and wins the respect of his sister, and Big Mom loses her wits!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The tragic and sad history of Big Mom is revealed! From abandonment, rescue, and again to ruin, Big Mom's voracious hunger has brought her into conflict with others from the very beginning!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Mom's Secret! The Giant's Island Elbaph and a Little Monster!

programme.title: Linlin enrages the Giants as she slays their respected warrior - but Mother throws herself on their mercy and begs for clemency for her beloved Linlin, forcing the troupe to leave Elbaph for good.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Birth of Mom! The Day That Carmel Vanished!

programme.title: Linlin, destroyed at the disappearance of Mother, falls in with a new cohort and finds a reason to go on living, proving herself a mighty force to be reckoned with! The Straw Hats' plan goes awry, and all hope looks to be lost!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Launcher Blasts! The Moment of Big Mom's Assassination!

programme.title: Bege and the Straw Hats are on the defensive as the full force of Mom's troops are brought down on them! As they retreat into a fortress, Germa 66 springs in to action! However, Bege has bad news for his allied forces.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The Straw Hats and Germa 66 are cornered in Bege's stronghold - with the full force of the Big Mom Pirates pinning them down, it's only a matter of time before their defenses crack. The only way out seems to be to make a break for it.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Cutting the Father-Son Relationship! Sanji and Judge!

programme.title: The plan is executed to sneak the Straw Hats out of Big Mom's castle while hidden inside Bege! But the irascible Luffy can't resist getting in at least one punch against his foe! Meanwhile, the Tamate Box slips into the hands of some surprising agent!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Escape From the Tea Party! Luffy vs. Big Mom!

programme.title: The full might of the Big Mom Pirates proves too much for the Straw Hats and Germa 66. With no other options, they decide to turn and fight, even though it means their total annihilation!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Execution Begins! Luffy's Allied Forces Are Annihilated?!

programme.title: The Whole Cake Chateau starts crumbling while everyone is trying to escape for their lives! Luffy and the others get away and move on to the next stage of their escape, which involves some parting of ways.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Castle Collapses! The Straw Hats Great Escape Begins!

programme.title: The Straw Hats continue their mad dash to the Sunny! As Big Mom rages, her underlings decide to turn her Hunger Pang attacks against the Straw Hats! The Whole Cake Island scrambles to remake the cake to calm down Big Mom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Spear of Elbaph! Onslaught! The Flying Big Mom!

programme.title: Kingbaum puts his life on the line ferrying the Straw Hats towards the Seducing Woods! But Big Mom's word trumps him in this terrifying forest, and soon enough she catches up! Meanwhile, Pudding puts her plan to rebuild the cake into action!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Pudding's Determination! Ablaze! The Seducing Woods!

programme.title: Zeus pursues the Straw Hats as Nami keeps him occupied. She has a shocking surprise in store for him, however, that might stop Big Mom in her tracks! Meanwhile, Brook and Chopper find the Shark Submerge in a strange situation.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Lightning Counterattack! Nami and Zeus the Thundercloud!

programme.title: Big Mom is relentless in her pursuit of the Straw Hats! Even being buried alive doesn't stop her! The plan to recreate the cake to stop her onslaught progresses, and Pudding's changeable heart confuses all those looking on!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Coincidental Reunion! Sanji and the Lovestruck Evil Pudding!

programme.title: Mama's onslaught continues as Pudding keeps battling the contradictory urges in her head - to kill or kiss Sanji! Meanwhile, Brook and Chopper are at Perospero's mercy - and are being reduced to sweetened versions of themselves!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Save the Sunny! Fighting Bravely! Chopper and Brook!

programme.title: Sandwiched between Big Mom and her advancing fleet, the only hope is the Sunny's Coup-de-Burst! But can the Straw Hats prepare it in time? Meanwhile, Pedro comes face to face with his past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Before the Dawn! Pedro, the Captain of the Guardians!

programme.title: The last chance the Straw Hats have is the Coup de Burst! Pedro has made the ultimate sacrifice to give them this one chance to escape, but Big Mom's naval forces are closing in and poised to knock them out!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I'll Be Back! Luffy, Deadly Departure

programme.title: Nami and the others who escaped the Whole Cake Island by Pedro's sacrifice mourn over his death. Jimbei, however, keeps his calm, which makes Brook lose his temper. Meanwhile, Luffy confronts the formidable Sweet General Katakuri in the Mirroworld.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Man with a Bounty of Billion! The Strongest Sweet General, Katakuri!

programme.title: Pudding and Sanji arrive at Cacao Island and begin to remake the only cake that will calm Big Mom! But their fake nuptials get in the way as they bicker like a married couple! Meanwhile, Luffy has lost the battle of his life.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Hard Battle Starts! Luffy vs. Katakuri!

programme.title: Luffy keeps the forces out to destroy the Straw Hats at bay, however the crew needs to destroy all the mirrors - the final link that secure his safe return - on the ship in order to save themselves!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Green Room! An Invincible Helmsman, Jimbei!

programme.title: Nami and the others start breaking all the mirrors on the Sunny in order to keep their enemies out while she and Luffy discuss where to rendezvous but little do they know the plan is overheard!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Threat of the Mole! Luffys Silent Fight!

programme.title: Both powerful combatants and strong users of Haki, Luffy and Katakuri are a dead match for each other. Every move is matched by their opponent! Elsewhere, the Big Mom Pirates square off against Germa!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The End of the Deadly Battle?! Katakuri's Awakening in Anger!

programme.title: Katakuri retires to his sanctuary to enjoy the merienda - a chance for him to savor the sweetness of his crew of chefs and replenish his Haki!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy discovers the secret to Katakuri's unearthly fighting ability, and just might have a solution for how to stop him! Meanwhile, at the Sweets Factory, Pudding receives a call from Brulee who has bad news for the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Fights Back! The Invincible Katakuri's Weak Point!

programme.title: Luffy runs out of his Haki and has to buy some time - in the most peculiar way! Meanwhile the Big Mom Pirates mobilize their entire fleet to squelch the pirate threat, and the replacement cake nears completion!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Another Crisis! Gear Four vs. Unstoppable Donuts!

programme.title: When Chiffon comes under attack, Sanji must choose between defending her or revealing himself to his enemies! Meanwhile, Luffy uses Brulee as a human shield to avoid the wrath of Big Mom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Rebellious Daughter, Chiffon! Sanji's Big Plan for Transporting the Cake!

programme.title: Bege arrives on the scene, seemingly willing to risk it all to bring down the Big Mom Pirates in a blaze of glory, but of course he has a trick up his sleeve! Meanwhile, Luffy keeps on the move to regain his Haki!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Man's Way of Life! Bege and Luffy's Determination as Captains!

programme.title: Sanji and Bege get together and get off of Cacao Island successfully, but their plan is in jeopardy as Oven begins to boil the sea itself! As Chiffon and the others who are on the ship are cornered, a surprising savior comes in to fight Oven!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Cake Sank?! Sanji and Bege's Getaway Battle!

programme.title: A vicious pincer attack bears down on the Straw Hats! Three fleets converge and try to squeeze the life from them! Daifuku himself take the lead! But Carrot draws on a deep power within and springs in to action under the light of the moon!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The much anticipated wedding cake is on its way, but there is a debate at the last minute! Shouldn't this opportunity be used to slip poison into Big Mom's meal to topple the Emperor of the Sea?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Break Through! The Straw Hat's Mighty Sea Battle!

programme.title: Luffy, through sheer force of will, can almost use his Haki to battle Katakuri! Meanwhile, the Sunny catches fire while the Straw Hats try to kick out Big Mom, but that's when Jimbei steps up to the plate and takes a swing at her!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Finally, They Clash! The Emperor of the Sea vs. the Straw Hats!

programme.title: Luffy tries to enhance his Haki to foresee Katakuri's next move, but Katakuri's attacks keep pulling him down!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dark King's Direct Precepts! The Battle Against Katakuri Turns Around!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #7 The Pursuit of Harimao's Treasure
programme.desc: To retrieve the Harimao's Treasure, Lupin and the gang must gather three lost statues. Lupin reluctantly partners with the aging "double-O" MI-6 agent Sir Archer and his granddaughter Diana to gather the statues.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #8 The Secret of Twilight Gemini
programme.desc: As Lupin's mentor Don Dolune lies on his deathbed, he hands the master thief a gift: the diamond named Twilight. But it's only half of the treasure-the other half of the Twilight can be found in Morocco

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Notorious gangster, Al Capone left behind five tiles that reveal the location of his massive gold hoard when put together. Out of the five tiles, Lupin and Fujiko have three in their possession.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata concocts an extravagant plan to finally capture Lupin by luring him in with a fake meteor made from 6 tons of pure gold. Low and behold, his plan backfires and Lupin and his gang make off with the meteor.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin sneaks into an old castle to steal a collection of priceless angel paintings, owned by the late Malcolm Hurst. Inside the castle, Lupin meets a mysterious girl named Flora, who knows the whereabouts of the angel paintings.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are out at sea attempting to retrieve the gold inside a sunken pirate ship. However, a female pirate gang interrupts their retrieval mission and both parties leave empty-handed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in South Africa to receive a nautical chart from a retired Nazi that shows the location of a sunken Nazi treasure. However, two young German soldiers interrupt the exchange and a skirmish ensues.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in the small city of San Pico in Central America. However, the city was in the midst of a war between the Government Forces and the Guerilla Army. Leading the Guerilla Army is Jigen's old army pal, Giranco.
programme.sub-title: Here Comes Lupin in a Tank

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Unsurprisingly, Fujiko had once betrayed her heist partner Garb, known as the Grim Reaper, and left him for dead. Garb, who has seemingly returned from the dead, is determined to kill Fujiko and has an uncanny ability to dodge bullets with ease.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious cult that idolizes a solid gold Virgin Mary statue abducts Fujiko and they're planning to burn her at the stake as a witch. However, her kidnapper and the cult leader look vaguely familiar to Lupin. Have they crossed paths before?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin has a horrible case of athlete's foot and visits Dr. Budweiser, who is also a cloning expert, for treatment. The doctor takes a sample of Lupin's skin under the guise of treating his Athlete's foot, but the doctor has another plan up his sleeve.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious message appears in the newspaper and Lupin takes it as a sign from this late grandfather, Lupin I, to reclaim his diamond keepsake.
programme.sub-title: A Treasure That Smells Like a Trap

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin manages to steal the Dracula Heart Ruby from a mysterious woman known as Mother. The Dracula Heart Ruby is known to bleed once every century and whoever drinks its blood maintains their youth for another 100 years.
programme.sub-title: The Ruby Sheds Tears of Blood

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin steals a painting of Lupin I's beloved from Baltan Gallery in Paris. However, the painting turns out to be a forgery and Lupin has a clue as to who is painting the forgeries. With his daughter Sophie held hostage.
programme.sub-title: The Prisoner Inside the Baltan Manor

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko attend a lavish party full of wealthy women in order to steal their jewelry. However, the castle tower where the party was being held turns out to be a rocket ship. The hijacked rocket transports the party and guests to a small island.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Mrs. Alda, a wealthy heiress is kidnapped and Lupin shows up to claim the ransom money. However, the real mastermind behind the kidnapping is Mrs. Alda herself. After she gets the ransom money, she erases Lupin's memory and frames him for the crime.
programme.sub-title: Care to Play a Kidnapping Game?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin learns he needs a pure-hearted girl to find an ancient Persian treasure and his computer chooses a girl named Lori. After getting some hands-on training from Jigen and Goemon, the two are headed to Jordan to find the treasure.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The Golden Apple, known as "Eve's Apple" is being transported to New York City on board a luxury cruise ship and Inspector Zenigata has a gut feeling Lupin is after it. Inspector Zenigata's hunch is on the mark as Lupin and Jigen are onboard the ship.
programme.sub-title: A Golden Apple Has Its Poison

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin is over the moon when Fujiko promises to marry him if he steals the ICPO's gold for her. Lupin pulls off the heist right under Inspector Zenigata's nose, but the two soon find themselves locked up in jail.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: It's the Mafia Boss' birthday party and everyone is gambling away. Lupin's next target is the casino's safe. While attending the party, Lupin meets a girl named Jenny, who is willing to help him pull off the heist to sell her name.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin breaks out a man named Parker from a Mexican prison in order to steal the treasure Parker had hidden away somewhere.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin, who was once duped by Mamushidayu into stealing diamonds, decides its payback time. Will Lupin get his revenge and finally get his share of diamonds after all?
programme.sub-title: The Man Who Erased His Past

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: An ancient burial mound has been discovered and etched on its walls are ancient mythical creatures with jewel-encrusted eyes. Lupin makes off with the blue dragon's crystal eye and kidnaps the archeologist in charge.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang break into a vault full of uncut diamonds. However, the diamonds suddenly catch on fire, and guess who is being blamed for it!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The Swiss Bank's Beirut branch is a mobile branch. Will Lupin manage to pull off the heist of this impenetrable bank and get out safely with Inspector Zenigata on his tail?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are after Taniyama's treasure from an ancient Chinese dynasty. Realizing that Lupin is after his treasure, Taniyama hires a lone assassin named Seiryuu to counter Goemon.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: How could Lupin and his gang refuse when a church priest asks them to retrieve the Dove's Eggs, the church's jewels, for the sake of Spoonland's children?

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiance, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: Men in Black, (1997, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Two top secret agents (Will Smith and Tommy Lee Jones) are on a mission of policing alien activities on planet Earth. The Men in Black's current assignment: to stop an intergalactic terrorist from making Earth his next victim.

programme.title: Men in Black II, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Agents Jay and Kay are re-teamed against a sinister seductress who represents the toughest challenge yet to the MIB.

programme.title: Men in Black, (2012, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Agent Jay travels back in time to 1969, where he teams up with a younger version of Agent Kay to stop an evil alien from destroying the future.

programme.title: Hansel and Gretel: Witch Hunters, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Get ready for a twisted take on the classic tale as Hansel and Gretel have turned pro, coping with the trauma of their childhood captivity by slaying witches for hire.

programme.title: Attack the Block, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: ATTACK THE BLOCK is a fast, funny, frightening action adventure movie that pits a teen street gang against an invasion of savage alien monsters. It turns a crazy mix of tough street kids into a team of kick ass heroes.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Gamer, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: Set in a future world where humans can control other humans in mass-scale, multi-player online gaming environments, a star player (Butler) from a game called 'Slayers' looks to regain his independence while taking down the game's mastermind (Hall).

programme.title: Legion, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: When God loses faith in mankind, he sends his Legion of angels to wipe out the human race for the second time. Man's only hope lies in a group of misfits holed up in a desert diner.

programme.title: One-Eyed Jacks, (1961, Western)
programme.desc: After robbing a Mexican bank, Dad Longworth takes the loot and leaves his partner Rio to be captured but Rio escapes and searches for Dad in California.

programme.title: Shane, (1953, Western)
programme.desc: A retired gunfighter, now a drifter determined to establish a peaceful life, comes to the aid of a homestead family threatened by a land baron and his hired gun.

programme.title: The Tin Star, (1957, Western)
programme.desc: Ben Owens, a greenhorn sheriff who hasnt worn his badge long... and wont live to wear it much longer unless he gets some savvy help.

programme.title: The Way West, (1967, Western)
programme.desc: Icons Kirk Douglas, Robert Mitchum and Richard Widmark star in this sumptuous, epic tale of the brave men and women in the U.S. who left the comfort and safety of life in the East for the promise of free land a better life in the untamed West.

programme.title: Angel and the Badman (2014), (1947, Action)
programme.desc: Quirt Evans, an all round bad guy, is nursed back to health and sought after by Penelope Worth, a Quaker girl. He eventually finds himself having to choose between his world and the world Penelope lives in.

programme.title: Robin Hood Of Texas, (1947, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry and the Cass County Boys are unjustly arrested as bank bandits. Released by police as decoys to locate the loot, Gene and the boys find themselves in trouble with the real bank robbers.

programme.title: Saddle Pals, (1947, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry goes to the home of hypochondriac landowner, who gets Gene to switch identities while he takes a vacation, giving Gene power-of-attorney. Gene has to raise $50,000 to save the properties.

programme.title: Fort Massacre, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Joel McCrea gives a compelling performance as a cavalry sergeant apparently leading his men to safety, but actually slowly going mad in an insane attempt to avenge an Indian massacre.

programme.title: Doc, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: Stacy Keach, Haris Yulin, and Faye Dunaway give riveting performances in this controversial and myth-shattering reexamination of the darker side of gunslinger Doc Holliday and the actions that led to the infamous showdown in Tombstone, Arizona.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity, (2009, Horror)
programme.desc: After a young, middle-class couple moves into what seems like a typical suburban house, they become increasingly disturbed by a presence that may or may not be demonic and active at night.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 2, (2010, Horror)
programme.desc: As a couple welcome a newborn baby into their home, a demonic presence begins terrorizing them, tearing apart their perfect world and turning it into an inescapable nightmare.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 3, (2011, Horror)
programme.desc: Paranormal Activity 3 takes you back to where it all began, and the activity is more intense than ever. The cameras are on and recording the chilling moments when evil begins to terrorize young sisters Katie and Kristi for the first time.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 4, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Katie disappeared with her nephew Hunter with no survivors. Five years later she's returned with a mysterious boy, ready to target new victims with her demonic rage in a quiet neighborhood.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Marked Ones, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: The activity is back and has claimed a new victim. Jesse has been hearing horrifying sounds from his neighbors apartment, but when he sets out to uncover their source, he encounters an ancient evil that wont rest until its claimed his soul.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: For the first time you will SEE the activity... When a new family moves into a familiar house, they discover a mysterious video camera that reveals the presence of a demonic threat and soon find themselves terrorized by an ancient evil.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity, (2009, Horror)
programme.desc: After a young, middle-class couple moves into what seems like a typical suburban house, they become increasingly disturbed by a presence that may or may not be demonic and active at night.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 2, (2010, Horror)
programme.desc: As a couple welcome a newborn baby into their home, a demonic presence begins terrorizing them, tearing apart their perfect world and turning it into an inescapable nightmare.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 3, (2011, Horror)
programme.desc: Paranormal Activity 3 takes you back to where it all began, and the activity is more intense than ever. The cameras are on and recording the chilling moments when evil begins to terrorize young sisters Katie and Kristi for the first time.

programme.title: Andrea steps up when the people of Woodbury are thrown into uncharted territory; a new threat arises at the prison.

programme.title: Rick tries to save one of his group; Woodbury is in disarray; new guests at the prison raise concerns.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The group debates the next step; Rick searches for a lost friend; Daryl and Merle question their choices; the Governor restores order.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Realizing they're running out of supplies, the group must make a choice when security is threatened; Andrea goes to the prison to attempt a negotiation.

programme.title: Realizing they are outgunned, Rick leads an expedition to get more weapons and fortify their group against the Governor and his forces.

programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The group learns that a truce with the Governor must come with a huge sacrifice on their part; Rick decides Michonne's fate.

programme.title: As the Governor's impending attack looms, Rick and the others consider whether the prison is worth defending; Andrea struggles to escape captivity.

programme.title: The group lives a more peaceful life at the prison and strives to hold onto humanity; problems arise when Rick encounters a new survivor.

programme.title: Facing a new enemy, Rick abandons his quiet lifestyle so that he and the others can fight to protect their hard-won livelihood.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: A group leaves the prison to search for supplies; the remaining members of the group deal with recent losses.

programme.title: Daryl and a small group set out on foot in search of medicine, but their mission faces obstacles; Rick and Carol find two uninfected stragglers in a nearby town.

programme.title: Assorted enemies pressure Rick and the group; the survivors and the prison may reach a breaking point.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Following his defeat at Woodbury, the Governor wanders aimlessly until he encounters a family in need.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa and Usagi befriend a young painter named Kamoi at the park. Kamoi is visited by Cere-Cere, who asks the man to paint a portrait of her.
programme.sub-title: Don't Lose Sight of Your Dreams: The Mirror of Truth

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa is curious to know why Pegasus is reluctant to tell her where he came from. When she confronts Pegasus with the question, he disappears.

programme.title: Sailor Moon

programme.title: O Grito 3
programme.desc: Dr. Sullivan descobre que os fantasmas de Kayako e Toshio tm como alvo uma nova famlia. Se ela falhar em convencer uma misteriosa mulher japonesa a ajudar a banir os espritos vingativos, todos os envolvidos enfrentaro um destino pior do que a morte.

programme.title: Possuda
programme.desc: Depois de descobrir que sua irm mais velha foi mordida por um lobisomem, a adolescente Brigitte embarca em uma misso desesperada para encontrar uma maneira de reverter o feitio e salv-la antes que seja tarde demais.

programme.title: O Espantalho

programme.title: A Ilha dos Tubares
programme.desc: Um grupo de completos estranhos se v isolado por um louco rico em seu complexo na ilha. Eles so forados a uma luva horripilante, onde devem sobreviver a uma barragem de espcies cada vez mais mortais de tubaro.

programme.title: Apocalipse Zumbi

programme.title: V/H/S
programme.desc: Um grupo de criminosos contratado para recuperar uma fita de vdeo. medida que eles buscam em pilhas de fitas VHS o vdeo certo, eles se deparam com um nmero aparentemente interminvel de vdeos assustadores, cada um mais estranho que o ltimo.

programme.title: O Monstro dentro de voc
programme.desc: Depois de uma noite de festa Lou se levanta com sintomas desagradveis que indicam que algo est errado. Seu corpo muda pouco a pouco de uma maneira estranha, h manchas em sua pele e ele tem vises que a impedem de distinguir a realidade da fico.

programme.title: Fada Dos Dentes
programme.desc: O conto de uma fada dos dentes mortal ganha vida e comea a aterrorizar uma pequena comunidade.

programme.title: Velocipastor
programme.desc: Depois de perder seus pais, um padre viaja para a China, onde herda uma habilidade misteriosa que lhe permite se tornar um dinossauro. Horrorizado com esse novo poder, uma prostituta o convence a us-lo para combater o crime.

programme.title: Cdigo de Honra
programme.desc: Um ex-coronel das foras especiais se torna um vigilante que mata criminosos, enquanto um ex-colega quer det-lo.

programme.title: Submundo
programme.desc: Quando os detetives da cidade grande se recusam a continuar investigando o assassinato do seu irmo mais novo cometido pela prpria gangue, o xerife de uma cidade pequena se disfara para encontrar o assassino do irmo e vingar a sua morte.

programme.title: Caado
programme.desc: Aaron Hallam um perigoso assassino, que mata suas vtimas de um modo peculiar: ele perseguia caadores de cervos como se fosse um esporte, em uma floresta de Portland.

programme.title: Linha de Ao
programme.desc: O prefeito contrata um ex-policial para investigar quem o amante de sua esposa. Apesar de suas antigas discordncias, ele aceita a tarefa, mas logo descobre as reais intenes por trs da investigao encomendada.

programme.title: Sobrenatural: Captulo 2
programme.desc: A sequncia arrapiante de Sobrenatural conta a histria da famlia assombrada Lambert, que procura descobrir o segredo de infncia misterioso que a deixou perigosamente ligada ao mundo dos espritos.

programme.title: Deus da guerra
programme.desc: Na dinastia Ming, onde o jovem general Qi Jiguang conquista uma importante vitria contra os piratas japoneses, comandando o exrcito chins. Quando, quatro anos depois, sua nao mais uma vez atacada, Qi se v obrigado a retornar aos campos de batalha.

programme.title: O Sequestro do nibus 657
programme.desc: Um pai no tem meios para pagar o tratamento mdico da filha. Como ltimo recurso, ele se une a um colega de trabalho ganancioso para roubar um cassino. Quando as coisas do errado, eles so forados a sequestrar um nibus da cidade.

programme.title: Linha de Ao
programme.desc: O prefeito contrata um ex-policial para investigar quem o amante de sua esposa. Apesar de suas antigas discordncias, ele aceita a tarefa, mas logo descobre as reais intenes por trs da investigao encomendada.

programme.title: Wasabi
programme.desc: Um duro detetive francs, chamado ao Japo para o funeral da esposa que o deixou h muito tempo atrs, descobre que tem uma filha adolescente cuja vida corre perigo, estando na mira da Yakuza.

programme.title: Justia Letal
programme.desc: A equipe de Kane (Steven Seagal) enfrenta a Nova Esperana da Nao Ariana enquanto trabalha para influenciar o voto do pblico nas eleies municipais.

programme.title: O Homem da Mfia
programme.desc: Um assalto a um jogo de pquer ilegal, cujos participantes eram integrantes da mfia, abala o mundo do crime. Um matador profissional contratado para investigar o caso, mas a hesitao de alguns dos participantes coloca a situao fora de controle.

programme.title: Caado
programme.desc: Aaron Hallam um perigoso assassino, que mata suas vtimas de um modo peculiar: ele perseguia caadores de cervos como se fosse um esporte, em uma floresta de Portland.

programme.title: O Sequestro do nibus 657
programme.desc: Um pai no tem meios para pagar o tratamento mdico da filha. Como ltimo recurso, ele se une a um colega de trabalho ganancioso para roubar um cassino. Quando as coisas do errado, eles so forados a sequestrar um nibus da cidade.

programme.title: Entre a Vida e a Morte
programme.desc: Ben Garvey leva uma vida simples ao lado de sua esposa Lisa e a filha Katie. Ele trabalha duro no Fort Garry Brewery Company, mas ainda est em perodo de experincia. quando recebe a visita de seu irmo Ricky, que acabou de deixar a priso.

programme.title: Emboscada
programme.desc: Liberty, a esposa de um fabricante de armas, tomada como refm por um homem chamado Joe. Joe explica que sua filha morreu em um tiroteio no colgio e planeja se vingar dos responsveis pela fabricao da arma usada para mat-la.

programme.title: Agentes Duplos
programme.desc: Danny Gallagher, um desacreditado detetive da narcticos recm sado da priso, busca vingana da pessoa responsvel pela a acusao que o levou a ser preso e que matou seu parceiro.

programme.title: Sombras da Lei
programme.desc: Sean Casey, um jovem advogado que, como novo membro da promotoria, escalado para uma importante investigao. Agora ele est mais prximo de desvendar um mistrio de corrupo policial em Nova Iorque.

programme.title: A Marca
programme.desc: Uma detetive de polcia est envolvida em um caso em que descobre que todas as vtimas de assassinato so seus ex-amigos.

programme.title: A ltima Profecia
programme.desc: Um reprter atrado para uma pequena cidade da Virgnia Ocidental para investigar uma srie de ocorrncias estranhas, incluindo vises psquicas e o aparecimento de entidades estranhas.

programme.title: Contgio mortal
programme.desc: O caos instala-se quando um vrus mortal transmitido pelo ar infecta a populao de uma cidade sul-coreana a menos de 20 quilmetros de Seul.

programme.title: Infectados
programme.desc: Aps perder contato com um grupo de pesquisadores em uma ilha remota, uma corporao militar contrata um grupo de cientistas para descobrir o que deu errado.

programme.title: Ces de Luta
programme.desc: Na tradio de UNDERWORLD e DISTRICT 9, toda Manhattan fica em quarentena quando o vrus Lupin se espalha como fogo, transformando civis inocentes em lobos vorazes. Nada menos que uma exploso nuclear pode parar o vrus monstruoso.

programme.title: A Hospedeira
programme.desc: Quando um inimigo invisvel ameaa a humanidade assumindo seus corpos e apagando suas memrias, Melanie Stryder arrisca tudo para proteger as pessoas com quem se importa.

programme.title: 2:22- Encontro Marcado
programme.desc: A vida de um homem sai dos trilhos quando um padro ameaador de eventos se repete exatamente da mesma maneira todos os dias, terminando precisamente s 2:22.

programme.title: Santurio Populao Um
programme.desc: Um jovem idealista, Ethan, procura por sua famlia enquanto luta contra os infectados, a milcia Med-Ex e os saqueadores sanguinrios.

programme.title: O Franco-Atirador
programme.desc: Depois de uma longa carreira como matador de aluguel, Martin Terrier pretende se aposentar e passar o resto da vida ao lado de sua amada. Mas ele descobre que est sendo trado por pessoas de sua confiana!

programme.title: Alvo Duplo
programme.desc: Dois caras dures e pertencentes a lados opostos da lei vo unir foras para dar um ponto final em uma onda de assassinatos brutais, mas a tarefa no ser nada fcil e muito sangue vai rolar.

programme.title: Evidncias de um Crime
programme.desc: Aps a morte de sua esposa, um policial abandona a profisso para cuidar da filha. Ele trabalha limpando cenas de crime, mas uma terefa rotineira acaba ameaando a vida estvel que construiu para a famlia.

programme.title: Co de briga
programme.desc: Criado por um mafioso (Hoskins) como um animal para ser uma mquina de matar, (Jet Li) campeo de lutas clandestinas que ajuda pianista cego (Freeman) perseguido por criminosos.

programme.title: Redeno
programme.desc: Jason Statham um veterano de guerra que assume uma nova identidade enquanto tenta se vingar dos assassinos de sua namorada grvida.

programme.title: Assassino Americano
programme.desc: O gngster americano Erik Vasquez est planejando se tornar o principal chefe do submundo mexicano, apenas para se ver fazendo inimigos tanto dos poderosos cartis quanto de seus prprios aliados.

programme.title: Era uma vez na China e na Amrica
programme.desc: Jet Li Wong Fei-Hong, heri chins que vai Amrica, salvo por ndios e luta contra a explorao de trabalhadores chineses por um tirano local.

programme.title: Combate
programme.desc: Um jovem lutador deve decidir seu destino; desistir de tudo e treinar para honra e glria ou sucumbir vida de um lutador de jaula por um mafioso russo.

programme.title: Ip Man - O Mestre do Kung Fu
programme.desc: Durante o tempo em que foi capito da polcia na cidade de Foshan, Ip Man perseguido por um gngster vingativo, enquanto o exrcito japons invade a regio.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A Retaliao
programme.desc: Kurt Sloan prometeu a si mesmo que no voltaria para a Tailndia, mas algum o seda e o fora a retornar ao pas asitico.

programme.title: Ninja
programme.desc: Casey um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japo para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instruo progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendrio Yoroi Bitsu, um ba blindado contendo as armas do ltimo Ninja Koga.

programme.title: O Monge Prova de Balas
programme.desc: Baseado em uma histria em quadrinhos "underground", ele conta a histria de um monge tibetano imortal -Chow- que se torna o mentor de um jovem menino de rua -Scott-, a quem ele ensina a proteger um velho pergaminho que o monge cuidou durante anos.

programme.title: Ascenso e Queda de Um Imprio
programme.desc: Em 1398, Kim Min-Jae o comandante supremo da dinastia Joseon. Apaixonado, ele assume riscos por sua mulher enquanto lida com a politicagem em torno da famlia real.

programme.title: Kingpin: Estes Loucos Reis do Boliche
programme.desc: Um astro do boliche cuja carreira foi prematuramente cortada espera levar um novo prodgio ao sucesso e riqueza.

programme.title: Austin Powers - Um Agente Nada Discreto
programme.desc: O agente secreto Austin Powers esteve congelado por dcadas e agora trazido de volta ativa quando uma nova ameaa mundial surge e suas habilidades so novamente requisitadas. Porm, Austin ter que se adaptar nova sociedade e isso ser hilrio.

programme.title: Loucos Por Dinheiro
programme.desc: Diretor de presdio obriga dois homens a se casarem com suas filhas, por acreditar que elas estejam grvidas. Os novos cunhados decidem roubar um trem e fugir. Enquanto isso, uma agente do FBI chega cidade para investigar a morte de um prisioneiro.

programme.title: Confuso de Elite
programme.desc: Luke, investigador GSG-10, e Theo, policial, tm que se unir quando Mascha, a filha do presidente da Moldvia, sequestrada do Palcio de Bellevue. Em sua misso de resgate, os dois deixam um enorme rastro de devastao.

programme.title: Cad a Minha Entrega?
programme.desc: Risos, furtos, caos uma carga de contrabando erroneamente entregue a uma gangue de bandidos incompetentes.

programme.title: Loucas por Amor, Viciadas em Dinheiro
programme.desc: Com Diane Keaton, Queen Latifah e Katie Holmes. Depois que seu marido perde o emprego, uma dona de casa comea a trabalhar limpando a Casa da Moeda e tem uma ideia: chamar suas amigas para roubar notas de dinheiro que seriam destrudas.

programme.title: O Casamento dos Meus Sonhos
programme.desc: Mary Fiore a planejadora de casamentos de maior prestgio em So Francisco. Ela est to ocupada realizando os sonhos de outras pessoas que no tem tempo para lidar com sua prpria vida.

programme.title: Uma Noiva em Apuros
programme.desc: Karina est fazendo o possvel para ter o primeiro relacionamento feliz em sua vida. Infelizmente, o homem a quem ela deu seu corao parece estar mais interessado em si mesmo do que nela.

programme.title: Por amor ao chocolate
programme.desc: Prestes a competir em um importante concurso de confeitaria, Aria v seus planos desmoronarem quando seu parceiro a abandona poucos dias antes do evento. No entanto, sua sorte muda ao conhecer um charmoso pai solteiro.

programme.title: Como Agarrar Meu Ex-Namorado
programme.desc: Stephanie Plum, desempregada e recm-divorciada, consegue um emprego na empresa de fianas de seu primo, onde sua primeira tarefa a coloca na pista de um policial local procurado por seu passado romntico.

programme.title: A Minha Verso do Amor
programme.desc: Com Paul Giamatti, Dustin Hoffman e Rosamund Pike. Nesta adaptao do romance de Mordechai Richler, o impulsivo produtor de televiso Barney Panofsky reflete sobre seus triunfos e fracassos ao final de sua plenamente vivida vida.

programme.title: O Clube das Mes Solteiras
programme.desc: Quando cinco mes solteiras com dificuldades colocam de lado suas diferenas para formar um grupo de apoio, elas encontram inspirao e risos em sua nova irmandade e ajudam-se mutuamente a superar os obstculos que esto em seu caminho.

programme.title: Encalhados
programme.desc: Megan de 28 anos, vai a um reencontro de amigos da escola e percebe que sua vida continua a mesma de 10 anos atrs. Porm, ao receber um pedido de casamento de seu namorado, ela entra em crise.

programme.title: Paixo Inocente
programme.desc: Esposa e me Megan, decide que a famlia deve receber a aluna de intercmbio Sophie.

programme.title: Uma Viagem Para Paris
programme.desc: Lucas, um rico empresrio francs, vai a Montana para uma proposta de negcio muito atraente. L, ele conhece Robin, se apaixona e a leva para Paris em uma incrvel aventura de Natal. Mas ser que os negcios acabaro com esse romance?

programme.title: Casamento de Verdade
programme.desc: Jenny uma mulher que sofre grande presso da famlia para encontrar um marido e se casar. Mas os pais ainda no sabem que Jenny lsbica, e namora Kitty, que todos acreditam ser apenas uma colega.

programme.title: Amor Idntico
programme.desc: Depois de ter sido abandonada ao altar, uma mdica voluntria no estrangeiro e descobre que o gmeo de seu ex-noivo tambm l est.

programme.title: No O Tipo Da Cinderela
programme.desc: Indy acha que sua vida est bem at que ela conhece um novo cara que a ajuda a descobrir quem ela e o que ela vale.

programme.title: Perseguido Pelo Destino
programme.desc: Em um circuito de corridas, o gngster Gigi (Matthias Schoenaerts), membro de uma cruel gangue criminosa de Bruxelas, conhece a jovem e rica corredora Bibi (Adle Exarchopoulos).

programme.title: A ltima Fortaleza
programme.desc: Seu servio ao seu pas o tornou um heri. Um erro o tornou prisioneiro. Para o General Eugene Irwin (Redford), apenas uma questo de cumprir sua sentena, at que ele descobre que seus colegas de cela esto sendo assassinatos.

programme.title: O Encontro
programme.desc: Nas ruas de Nova York, vive George. Ele est com a sade fragilizada e no tem pra onde ir. Quando George se refugia no maior abrigo de Manhattan, o Hospital Bellevue, ainda se sente perdido, pois o ambiente hostil e est lotado.

programme.title: Instinto
programme.desc: Apesar dos seus conhecimentos e experincia, uma psicloga experiente est completamente apaixonada pelo criminoso sexual que est a tratar numa instituio penal.

programme.desc: Beyblade Burst - S1E32

programme.title: O irmo de Sango, Kohaku, foi possudo por Narak e est tentando matar Agome. Enquanto isso, Inuyasha e Mirok continuam lutando contra Kagura.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S2E23

programme.title: Sesshomaru visita o youkai da rvore Bokusen-Oh buscando os segredos da transformao de Inuyasha. Enquanto isso, Sango se preocupa com um Kohaku inconsciente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S2E24

programme.title: Inuyasha se transforma em um youkai quando sua vida corre perigo. Ele rapidamente acaba com Gatenmaru, que se transformou. Ele ataca os bandidos que esto escapando com suas garras, e ele no pode ouvir Agome tentando par-lo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S2E25

programme.title: Inuyasha visita Totosai com a Tessaiga quebrada. Sua prpria presa usada para consert-la.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S2E26

programme.title: Ryukotsusei tira a Tessaiga de Inuyasha e ele se transforma em um youkai. Totosai diz a todos para recuar porque esto em perigo, mas Agome decide ficar para trs.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S2E27

programme.title: Em uma certa aldeia, Shippo conhece uma garota chamada Satsuki. Satsuki acredita que seu irmo, que foi guerra, voltar. Ela mostra a Shippo o tesouro que seu irmo lhe deu, um fragmento de Jia. Infelizmente, apenas uma flor feita de pedra.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E1

programme.title: Os maridos esto sendo atrados para longe de sua aldeia por uma bela youkai. Suas esposas pedem a Mirok para derrot-la. Preocupado com ele, Sango o acompanha. Mas Sango separada dele por uma nvoa estranha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E2

programme.title: Sango volta para a vila dos exterminadores para consertar seu Osso Voador. Indo para o poo, Agome encontra uma Nimenka, uma fruta que parece um rosto.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E3

programme.title: Tokajin sequestra Agome. Inuyasha escapa do jardim em miniatura com a ajuda de Mirok e os outros e vai salvar Agome. Enquanto escapa, ele encontra uma flor com o rosto de um velho sbio.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E4

programme.title: Sango retorna para a sua vila e conserta o Osso Voador. Ela tambm coloca o pai e as cinzas de seus companheiros para descansar. Quando ela est prestes a sair, ela atacada.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E5

programme.title: Narak chama uma sacerdotisa chamada Tsubaki. H cinquenta anos ela foi derrotada por Kikyo quando foi atrs da Jia. Ela uma sacerdotisa sombria que vendeu sua alma a um youkai para manter sua juventude e agora est atrs do sangue de Agome.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E6

programme.title: Agome luta contra a maldio colocada por Tsubaki, uma sacerdotisa sombria. Enquanto isso, Kikyo aparece diante de Tsubaki.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E7

programme.title: A maldio de Tsubaki rouba a conscincia de Agome. Agome esquece o Japo feudal em um mundo ilusrio.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E8

programme.title: Tsubaki visita a manso onmyoji onde ela j treinou e planeja abrir uma porta proibida com o poder da Jia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E9

programme.title: Tsubaki uma sacerdotisa que foi considerada a par com Kikyo. Ela estava com raiva porque a Jia no lhe foi confiada, ento se tornou uma sacerdotisa sombria.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E10

programme.title: Uma noite, algum possui Sango para atacar Mirok. O grupo examina um youkai que eles suspeitam estar por trs disso, mas esto enganados. Mirok possudo em seguida e ataca Sango. Shippo tenta fugir, mas encurralado por uma pequena sombra.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E11

programme.title: H uma fenda na barreira de Narak. Mas o comeo do ms, e quando a noite cai, Inuyasha perde seus poderes, e a busca por Narak adiada.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E12

programme.title: Kagura se aproxima de Sesshomaru e diz a ele para matar Narak, mas Sesshoumaru se recusa. Enquanto Inuyasha e os outros procuram por Kagura, eles percebem que Narak um meio-youkai.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E13

programme.title: Shippo recebe uma carta desafiando-o para uma batalha. O remetente da carta Soten Raijyu, e ele ainda apenas uma criana. Ele investigou Inuyasha e os outros e determinou que eles eram muito fortes, ento ele focou sua ateno em Shippo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E14

programme.title: Um youkai nascido de um pedao de carne que Narak descartou se transforma em um homem sem rosto e rouba o rosto bonito de Muso, um monge viajante.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E15

programme.title: Muso ataca Agome e Inuyasha o destri com sua Ferida do Vento. Narak, que estava assistindo ao evento, diz a Kagura para contar a Inuyasha onde Muso foi.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E16

programme.title: Ohm silencia Chopper com um ataque do qual poucos se recuperariam. Luffy comea a perceber algo estranho na caverna, e quatro temveis guerreiros se preparam para a batalha!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E40

programme.title: Zoro, Gan Fall, Wyper e Ohm se renem para um combate mortal nas Runas de Cima. Enquanto isso, Luffy tenta fugir das entranhas de uma serpente venenosa!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E41

programme.title: Zoro e Wyper precisam derrotar os mesmos inimigos, mas precisaro sobreviver ao arame farpado branco da Provao de Ferro!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E42

programme.desc: One Piece - S3E43

programme.title: O Deus Enel inicia um ataque mortal para exterminar os seres vivos em Skypiea, tornando as runas de Shandora uma batalha sangrenta onde a sobrevivncia est em jogo.
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E44

programme.title: Gan Fall, Wyper, Zoro e Robin se unem para atacar Enel. Apesar de sua furiosa investida, os quatro guerreiros so incapazes de deter a deidade do relmpago, at que Wyper usa o poder de uma pedra mstica!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E45

programme.title: O Deus Enel se recupera incrivelmente das feridas que deveriam colocar fim ao seu reinado de terror. Zoro e Wyper unem foras para uma investida final, e Nami deve escolher entre seus companheiros e sua prpria sobrevivncia.
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E46

programme.title: Luffy escapa da serpente e, diante do que aconteceu nas runas, s pensa em vingana! O Chapu de Palha avana para confrontar Enel!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E47

programme.title: Enquanto os cidados do cu fogem, Enel conjura Deathpiea! Luffy est determinado a deter o tirano, mas primeiro precisa descobrir como pr as mos em Deus!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E48

programme.title: Um punhado de ouro pode ser a runa de Luffy, Sanji e Usopp formam um time de resgate areo e Nami se prepara para um confronto eletrizante contra o Deus Enel!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E49

programme.title: Usopp e Sanji embarcam a Arca Maxim para salvar Nami, e o pirata mentiroso chega bem a tempo de impedir que a gatuna seja dilacerada por um ataque do Deus Enel! Enquanto isso, onde foi parar o cozinheiro?
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E50

programme.title: Apesar do globo de ouro que o prende, Luffy sobe o p de feijo gigante para acertar as contas com Enel, enquanto o povo da ilha encara a clera de Deus!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E51

programme.title: Um vislumbre das vidas de duas lendas da histria de Skypiea - Montblanc Noland e o Grande Guerreiro Calgara!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E52

programme.title: A saga de Montblanc Noland e Calgara segue com a histria de como dois homens to distintos desenvolveram sua amizade to rapidamente quanto a perderam!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E53

programme.title: Montblanc Noland e Calgara conseguem superar suas diferenas antes de dizerem adeus, mas outras foras conspiram para separ-los para sempre!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E54

programme.title: Enel devasta a Ilha dos Anjos com um trovo obliterador e Luffy continua sua escalada heroica no p de feijo gigante!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E55

programme.desc: One Piece - S3E56

programme.title: O raciocnio rpido de Nami deixa Luffy mais perto de Deus, e o Chapu de Palha se lana para o centro de uma sinistra tempestade!

programme.title: Aps a batalha pica contra Enel, o sol volta a brilhar sobre a Ilha do Cu e seus cidados reconstroem seu lar.

programme.title: Terminator: Dark Fate (2019)
programme.desc: Seasoned warrior Sarah Connor joins forces with a hybrid cyborg human and the T-800 model to protect a young woman from the Rev-9 -- a newly modified and seemingly indestructible liquid Terminator from the future.

programme.title: The Infernal Machine (2022)
programme.desc: Reclusive and controversial author Bruce Cogburn is drawn out of hiding when he begins to receive endless letters from an obsessive fan. What ensues is a dangerous labyrinth as Bruce searches for the person behind the cryptic messages.

programme.title: Zero Dark Thirty (2012)
programme.desc: The work of a dedicated female CIA operative becomes instrumental in the hunt for and elimination of Osama bin Laden.

programme.title: Proud Mary (2018)
programme.desc: Mary is a professional assassin who works for a ruthless gangster and his organized crime family in Boston. Her desire to save a 12-year-old boy from the streets soon causes an all-out turf war that forces her to take down whoever stands in her way.

programme.title: Men in Black II (2002)
programme.desc: Two interstellar agents try to stop an alien disguised as a lingerie model from destroying the world.

programme.title: Arena Wars (2024)
programme.desc: In 2045 convicted criminals have the opportunity to compete on the worlds number one televised sporting event, Arena Wars; they must survive 7 rooms and 7 of the most vicious killers in the country; if they win, they regain their freedom.

programme.title: Wolves (2016)
programme.desc: A talented high school basketball players (Taylor John Smith) dreams of playing college ball are jeopardized by his hard-drinking fathers (Michael Shannon) compulsive gambling.

programme.title: Lions for Lambs (2007)
programme.desc: The experiences of two soldiers in Afghanistan ties together separate stories unfolding in California and Washington, D.C.

programme.title: Slingshot (2024)
programme.desc: An astronaut struggles to maintain his grip on reality during a possibly compromised mission to Saturns moon, Titan.

programme.title: The Warriors (1979)
programme.desc: Gang members blamed for the murder of a charismatic street leader are forced to fight their way back to their turf.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity (2007)
programme.desc: A young couple (Katie Featherston, Micah Sloat) move into their first new home but are disturbed by what appears to be a supernatural presence that is most active at night.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 2 (2010)
programme.desc: After experiencing what they think are break-ins, a family realizes that the events unfolding before them are more sinister than they seem.

programme.title: First Blood (1982)
programme.desc: Green Beret veteran Rambo (Sylvester Stallone) takes on a Pacific Northwest sheriff (Brian Dennehy) and the National Guard.

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II (1985)
programme.desc: A former Green Beret (Sylvester Stallone) goes on a reconnaissance mission to spring MIAs from a Viet Cong prison.

programme.title: Rambo III (1988)
programme.desc: Former Special Forces agent John Rambo blasts through Soviet-occupied Afghanistan in search of his captive mentor.

programme.title: Scream (1996)
programme.desc: A psycho killer targets a past victims daughter (Neve Campbell), while a tabloid TV reporter (Courteney Cox) homes in on his identity.

programme.title: Scream 2 (1997)
programme.desc: A masked killer continues to pursue a California student (Neve Campbell) and her friends at an Ohio college.

programme.title: Scream 3 (2000)
programme.desc: Murders draw a young woman (Neve Campbell), a reporter (Courteney Cox Arquette) and an ex-policeman (David Arquette) to the set of a movie inspired by horrific events that they survived.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction (1994)
programme.desc: Two hit men (John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson), a boxer, a crime boss and others meet their fates over the course of two days.

programme.title: Vampire in Brooklyn (1995)
programme.desc: A Caribbean vampire seeks the half-vampire, half-human New York homicide detective destined to be his bride.

programme.title: Limitless (2011)
programme.desc: An unemployed writer rises to the top of the financial world after an experimental drug gives him extraordinary mental acuity.

programme.title: Cloverfield (2008)
programme.desc: A group of friends venture deep into the streets of New York on a rescue mission during a rampaging monster attack.

programme.title: The Devil Inside (2012)
programme.desc: A woman (Fernanda Andrade) recruits two young exorcists to help her determine whether her mother, who murdered three people, is mentally ill or possessed by demons.

programme.title: The Survivalist (2021)
programme.desc: A year and a half after the fall of civilization due to a viral outbreak, a former FBI agent is forced to protect a young woman immune to the disease from a dangerous gang leader hunting her.

programme.title: Gone Baby Gone (2007)
programme.desc: Two private investigators (Casey Affleck, Michelle Monaghan) tread dangerous ground as they scour the Boston underworld for a kidnapped child.

programme.title: Night Falls on Manhattan (1996)
programme.desc: A fledgling district attorneys (Andy Garcia) probe of a New York Police Department scandal may implicate his father.

programme.title: Anthropoid (2016)
programme.desc: In December 1941, two Czech soldiers (Cillian Murphy, Jamie Dornan) parachute into their occupied homeland to assassinate Nazi officer Reinhard Heydrich (Detlef Bothe).

programme.title: Breaking In (2018)
programme.desc: A woman takes her two children on a weekend getaway to her late fathers secluded, high-tech estate in the countryside. She soon finds herself in a desperate fight to save all of their lives when four men break into the house to find hidden money.

programme.title: Fight Club (1999)
programme.desc: Two young professionals (Brad Pitt, Edward Norton) create an underground club where men can compete in hand-to-hand combat.

programme.title: Fight or Flight (2024)
programme.desc: A mercenary takes on the job of tracking a high-value asset known only as "The Ghost" on an international flight. Realizing the plane is filled with assassins assigned to kill them both, the pair must work together in a fight for their lives.

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Black (2016)
programme.desc: In a spoof of "Fifty Shades of Grey," wealthy entrepreneur Christian Black (Marlon Wayans) introduces a young woman (Kali Hawk) to his kinky world of SandM.

programme.title: All About the Benjamins (2002)
programme.desc: A bounty hunter and a con artist work together to retrieve a lottery ticket from a group of diamond thieves.

programme.title: Frank Millers Sin City (2005)
programme.desc: Lawmen, prostitutes (Devon Aoki, Alexis Bledel), a hulking thug and other sordid characters run amok in a crime-ridden metropolis.

programme.title: Approaching the Unknown (2016)
programme.desc: An American astronaut (Mark Strong) tests his will, sanity and endurance while embarking on a one-way, solo mission to Mars.

programme.title: Jacobs Ladder (1990)
programme.desc: A Vietnam vet prone to flashbacks walks the edge of sanity as he searches for the cause of his nightmarish visions.

programme.title: Heat (1995)
programme.desc: A wily bank robber (Robert De Niro) planning retirement leaves scant clues for a Los Angeles detective (Al Pacino) with family problems.

programme.title: Road to Perdition (2002)
programme.desc: Accompanied by his eldest son, a Depression-era mob enforcer (Tom Hanks) seeks revenge after the rest of his family are murdered by his employers (Paul Newman) jealous son.

programme.title: Nightcrawler (2014)
programme.desc: A freelance cameraman (Jake Gyllenhaal) goes to increasingly greater lengths to get shots of the most-lurid and disturbing crimes on the dark streets of Los Angeles.

programme.title: Switchback (1997)
programme.desc: A college student (Jared Leto) and a former rail worker (Danny Glover) are suspects in an FBI agents (Dennis Quaid) hunt for a serial killer who abducted his son.
